bio.heading: Who is Ali?
description: Having embarked on my coding journey in 2015, not-so-professionally at first, I now boast about 5 years of experience as a full-stack wizard, weaving magic in React and C#. I've conquered legacy systems, danced with microservices, and even managed secret npm enchantments for exporting spreadsheets.

From SQL Server to MySQL and beyond, my coding spells also include crafting delightful UIs and seamlessly integrating with Next.js, all in the pursuit of delivering exceptional results and sprinkling a dash of innovation in software development.
When I am not leading my team towards to success, you can find me at the gym, going to the beach, delving into history  and islamic books or podcasts, or tinkering with new software tools.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Developed TypeScript interfaces for props and created demo sites using Next.js in TypeScript. Refactored TypeScript, encapsulated reusable components into an NPM package used across multiple applications, and maintained adherence to SOLID principles and clean code practices. Additionally, conducted training for junior developers in React using TypeScript and documented system details on Confluence.

experience.title: Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: As CEO of my consulting company, I oversaw all operations, managing finances, client relationships, and driving revenue growth. Utilized interpersonal skills to build strong relationships, instrumental in securing new business and facilitating the company's expansion, while helping clients achieve their business objectives through innovative consulting solutions.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: In my role, I strategically planned the Minimum Viable Product (MVP), leading a team of engineers and UX designers, aligning technical goals with business objectives, and leveraging my leadership skills to build a cohesive and motivated team, resulting in the successful and timely delivery of high-quality products within budget.

experience.title: Founding Software Engineer
experience.description: As the Founding Software Engineer, I played a multifaceted role, spearheading the development of compelling designs for the landing page and web application, refactoring code, integrating UI libraries like Material-UI and Chakra-UI, utilizing advanced technologies such as Next.js, ensuring responsive code, and consistently incorporating customer feedback to enhance the product.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Revitalized a client's legacy system with Angular on the client side and Node.js on the server side, employing microservices and gRPC for internal communication. Managed private npm packages for features like exporting spreadsheets and handled database tasks, including converting SQL server stored procedures to MySQL and addressing related issues.

education.degree: Multiple Certificates in Docker, UI/UX, and AWS Infrastructure

capabilities.description: Built component libraries and applications by leveraging libraries like Reactstrap, Mui, Chakra UI, and Ant Design.

capabilities.description: Built backend API's by leveraging .NET and .NET Core.

capabilities.description: Implement custom user interfaces that are user friendly for customer and employee facing applications

expertise.description: Contributed to customer-facing DTCs and the employee-facing portal.
